key.name: product-window-width
key.summary: The width of the Products window.
key.description: The width of the Products window. Must be greater than 600, or it will not take effect.

key.name: product-window-height
key.summary: The height of the Products window.
key.description: The height of the Products window. Must be greater than 300, or it will not take effect.

key.name: product-pane-width
key.summary: The width of the Products pane.
key.description: The width of the Products pane. This is the divider between the product list on the left and the edit view on the right.

key.name: product-ordering-financial-pane-width
key.summary: The width of the pane on the Ordering/Financial tab.
key.description: The width of the pane between the ordering widgets and financial widgets.

key.name: product-name-column-width
key.summary: The width of the Products name column.
key.description: The width of the Products name column on the left side of the window.

key.name: contact-window-width
key.summary: The width of the Contacts window.
key.description: The width of the Contacts window. Must be greater than 825, or it will not take effect.

key.name: contact-window-height
key.summary: The height of the Contacts window.
key.description: The height of the Contacts window. Must be greater than 625, or it will not take effect.

key.name: contact-pane-width
key.summary: The width of the Contacts pane.
key.description: The width of the Contacts pane. This is the divider between the contact list on the left and the edit view on the right.

key.name: contact-name-column-width
key.summary: The width of the Contacts name column.
key.description: The width of the Contacts name column on the left side of the window.
